name: Gates of Logic
description:
This is a game for 2-8 players! It can be played with the keyboard (with WASD and Arrow keys) or with gamepads, or a combination of the two.

The Android must repair the conduits and find the exit. However, there's a catch!

Two or more players are co-operating to control the android at once! And there's another catch! Every time the Android passes through a Logic Gate, the rules that govern who gets to control the Android change!

OR: Any player can control the Android!

AND: All players must synchronise their controls to move!

XOR (Exclusive Or): Only one player can move the Android at a time!

NOT: The Android will perform an action if NOBODY is pressing a control!

RACE MODE

Play with four or more players to activate RACE MODE, where the game becomes split-screen and the teams have to compete to try and reach the exit first!

There are three levels. The game is short, but sweet!

Credits: 

Programming & Game Design: Sean Flannigan

Art: Alex Ujdur, Alex Tomov

Music Credit: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise
